Class BoardCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.render.BoardCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class BoardCanvas
extends java.awt.Canvas
    this class is a custom canvas, this is where the tiles will be displayed and the game will take place

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(int w,
                 int h)
        when called this will go through the board and draw each tile. and scale them to fit
        Parameters:
        w - - the width of the plane behind (so that we can scale to fit that)
        h - - the height of the plane behind (so that we can scale to fit that)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
